title: What am I doing, legally, when I 'purchase' a skin from the LoL store?
body:
I feel like at some point Riot made a change to the ToS to dictate that we're not actually purchasing the content anymore (this way they could hypothetically turn Fizz into an ADC from Mt Targon and anyone with skins for him has no legal right to demand refunds).

Are we renting content now? What's the legal definition?
